text: Ceylon is an unincorporated community in Wabash Township, Adams County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. ==History== A post office was established at Ceylon in 1884, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1895. Ceylon was likely named after the British colony of Ceylon. ==Geography== Ceylon is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Adams County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Ceylon, Indiana
